mapper.insert: insert into member (email, pwd, nick_name) values (#{email}, #{pwd}, #{nick_name})
mapper.select: select email, nick_name, reg_at, last_login, grade from member order by reg_at desc
select email, pwd, nick_name, grade from member where email = #{email}
mapper.update: update member set pwd = #{pwd}, nick_name = #{nick_name}, grade = #{grade} where email = #{email}
mapper.select: select email, nick_name, last_login, grade from member where email = #{email} and pwd = #{pwd}
